title: Peru: the revolution that never was
creator_credit: Peter Tiffin, David Elstein and Thames Television
brief_description: Shows the abject poverty and miserable life style still endured by Peruvian peasant farmers, and notes how the changes to the land tenure system brought about by the 1968 revolution have failed to bring any change in the deplorable living standards of the Peruvian peasant farmer. Suitable for middle and upper secondary level.
